title: How did Cosmic Girls do dancing to 'I Wish' 2x as fast on 'Weekly Idol'? | allkpop.com
text:
Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me How did Cosmic Girls do dancing to 'I Wish' 2x as fast on 'Weekly Idol'? By KpopJoA 4 minutes ago 544 31 0 0 Google+ Twelve members of girl group Cosmic Girls made a guest appearance on the February 22 broadcast of MBC's 'Weekly Idol,' member Mei Qi couldn't be on the show as she had a conflicting filming schedule in China during the recording of this show.
The girls gave a very impressive performance dancing to their hit song "I Wish" twice as fast as normal. The girls were perfectly in sync with each other and matched the sped up music, presenting a fun atmosphere. 
Once the performance was over and despite their exhaustion, Cosmic Girls gave a message to the viewers in a professional manner, "Please look forward to our upcoming performances of 'I Wish' and thank you so much for your support."
